import.importFileLabel: Choose images to import (time codes in file names supported)
import.importFilesInfo:
Use time-coded filenames:
start_HH_MM_SS_MMM__end_HH_MM_SS_MMM[_index].ext

Examples:
0_00_01_042__0_00_03_919_0001.png
0_00_01_042__0_00_03_919.png

Rules:
• HH_MM_SS_MMM for start and end times
• Double underscore separates start/end
• Optional index after end time
import.multipleFiles: Import from multiple text files (one file is one subtitle)
